name: Derby Jockey: Kishu-ou he no Michi
storyline: Derby Jockey - Kishu Or heno Michi is an equestrian race simulation game released on Super NES. In this very complete game where management holds a large part, you will be able to acquire different types of horses. You will also have to train them, before embarking on the quest for the first on the biggest racetracks around the world.
summary: Derby Jockey is a Sports game, developed by Graphic Research and published by Asmik Ace Entertainment, Inc, which was released in Japan in 1994.
